description: a list of grammar concepts and their specific components necessary to learn for the given CEFR level

name.description: a name for the grammar concept

components.description: the list of components that make up the entire grammar concept

items.description: a given component of a grammar concept

description.description: a quick description of what the component is. This must be in the source language

examples.description: a list of 3 examples for the given component of how it's used in a word, phrase, or sentence. These must be in the target language

items.description: a simple example implementation of the given component
